value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I began to have my doubts when Ylgr
met $Nu.$k$pWe journeyed to Múspell and
encountered the princess for the
first time...$k$pShe should not have known of
$Nu.$k$pBut there it was. She recognized the
face, and she said the name. Had
they met before?$k$pI thought it strange. Of course, she
might have heard some details about
$Nu in prison.$k$pOr maybe they HAD met before...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Your suspicions were roused.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|It wasn't a mistake. It was a childish
prank. She said it on purpose, to sow
the seeds of doubt.$k$pThat...gave me an idea of who it was.$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face_Anger|You should have brought this to our
attention sooner. I must find Ylgr at
once.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Prince Hríd...$k$pWait, please. Something is troubling
me.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|What now?$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face|Oh?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|You seem to agree that Princess
Ylgr's behavior was suspicious...$k$pBut that doesn't mean we must
confine our suspicions to her.$k$pRight now, your behavior worries me
more.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What are you talking about?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|We've seen your little trick before.
You can assume whatever form you
wish.$k$pCommander Anna, Princess Ylgr, and
now, Prince Hríd.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|It is true that Princess Ylgr has given
us cause for suspicion. That shields
you from our gaze...$k$pYou're dancing in the background,
dangling the answers we seek...
Taunting us. That is your objective.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Brother? Truly? No, it can't be...
Unless...$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Don't fall for Alfonse's trickery,
Fjorm. Trust in me.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|You should step away from him,
Princess.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|This is all too much! What do you
think, $Nu?$k$pWhat should I do?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Stop, fiend!$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Ha!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|What? We are beset by an extra
Prince Alfonse!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I have tried my best to be observant.
Yet I never anticipated this...$k$pYou've had enough fun, sown enough
chaos.$k$pIt is time we end this, Loki.$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Oh, dear.$k$p

$SspSE_EFFECT_MIL|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|$Fi500|$w0|You've finally figured it out. How
disappointing...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|You posed as Princess Ylgr from the
start—that's how you infiltrated our
group.$k$pThe real Princess Ylgr is probably the
other royal offering to the Rite of
Flame...$k$pAfter all, Zacharias told us the name
of only one of the victims.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Of course she is, dear. That girl will
be cast squealing into the flames,
alongside dear Veronica.$k$pThere's just one more riddle for you
to puzzle out...$k$p$EFace_Cool|Exactly how do you plan to defeat
me? I'm so eager to see what answer
you come up with.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Pain|My, my. You've defeated me. I should
have expected nothing less from you,
$Nu! Hee-hee.$k$p

$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Very good, my dears. I knew you'd
get the right answer sooner or later.
And now, for your reward...$k$pThe king—and poor Veronica—await
you in the temple where the Rite of
Flame is conducted. $k$pThe only way to reach them in time
is by a secret entrance...$k$p$EFace_Smile|Here you go, $Nu.
This map has the details.$k$pI can't say how long Veronica has
left to live, but you had better hurry,
I think.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Why would you give this to us? Surtr
is your master. $k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|That is true, but it's not the whole
truth... I have my own role to play.$k$p$EFace_Smile|And we must face facts. Princess
Veronica is irresistible. I'd hate for
her to die just yet...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I'm sure.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|I believe that brings my part in this
to its conclusion. It is time you
challenged Surtr.$k$pWill you prevail, or will you die?
Whichever it is, I'll enjoy watching
from on high. Good luck, my dears!$k$p$Sbs150|
